front.title: IEEE Standard for Insulation Shields on Medium-Voltage (15 kV - 35 kV) Cable Joints and Separable Connectors

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Design tests for shield resistance, simulated touch current, and a simulated fault-current initiation for insulation shields used on cable accessories, specifi cally 15 kV through 35 kV class joints, and separable insulated connectors are covered in this standard.
